channel.title: My little problem
channel.description:
hello
i want to make it so that affter you kill something you get xp in a skill
i have seen in some servers(pking) when u click on an object and get xp its for say str and slayer is there a way i can make it so affter u kill an npc that you get exp in the slayer skill??
